mapper.sql: select k.id, k.parent_id, k.name, k.category, k.event_type, k.create_time, k.create_id, k.status, (select pname from og_person p where p.pid=k.create_id) as create_name, k2.name as parent_name, k.sys_id, os.caption as sys_name, (select count(1) from knowledge_content kc where (kc.sys_id = k.sys_id and k.category=0) or (kc.content = k.id and k.category=1) or (kc.sectitle = k.id and k.category=2) or (kc.threetitle = k.id and k.category=3)) as isused from knowledge_titil k left join knowledge_titil k2 on k2.id=k.parent_id left join og_sys os on k.sys_id = os.sysid
mapper.insert: insert into knowledge_titil( id, parent_id, name, event_type, category, create_id, sys_id, status, create_time )values( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{eventType}, #{category}, #{createId}, #{sysId}, #{status}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from knowledge_content where sys_id = #{id} or content = #{id} or sectitle = #{id} or threetitle = #{id}
select count(0) from knowledge_titil where category = #{category} and sys_id = #{sysId} and event_type=#{eventType}
mapper.update: update (select kt.id, kt.name, kt.sys_id, os.caption as sysname from knowledge_titil kt left join og_sys os on os.sysid=kt.sys_id where kt.event_type=0 and kt.category=1 and kt.name <> os.caption ) a set a.name = a.sysname
